Spells:
Animal Shapes (O8 Tran): R75' 20 willing targets in 15' radius become chosen diminutive - huge animal or small - medium magical beast for 20 hr
Awaken (O5 Tran): Touched animal or tree gains human sentience (DC 18 Will neg)
Barkskin (O2 Tran): Touched gains +5 natural armor for 200 min
Charm Animal (O1 Ench): R75' Target treats self as trusted friend for 20 hr (DC 15 Will neg)
Creeping Doom (O7 Conj): R75' 10 centipede swarms inflict 4d6 HP, obey self for 20 rd
Grove Of Respite (O4 Conj): R75' Creates 20' radius grove that reports intruders and provides water and fruit that feeds 8 and heals 1 HP for 40 hr
Speak With Plants (O3 Divi): Self converses w/plants for 20 min
Stone Tell (O6 Divi): Self speaks w/stone for 20 min
Telepathic Bond (Transcendental Bond5 Divi): R75' Self and/or 6 willing targets in 15' diameter share thoughts for 200 min
World Wave (O9 Tran): Self rides 20'x10' natural terrain oval that forms 30' wave for 20 rd or 5' swell for 20 hr, moves 160'/rd, and inflicts 6d6 (wave) or 1d6 (swell) HP bludgeoning to non-natural objects (constructs and undead suffer dbl HP)
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half or all spell damage to cold damage; uses +1 spell slot
Empower Spell: x1.5 chosen spell variable effects uses +2 spell slot
Friend To The Animals: Knows all Summon Nature's Ally spells
Maximize Spell: Maximize all chosen spell variable effects uses +3 spell slot
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Speak With Animals (Oracle): May converse at will with 7 chosen animal types
Transcendental Bond: May use Telepathic Bond effects on 3 allies 20 rd/dy; may cast touch spell on 1 of these remotely 1/dy
